document_data.name: Harbreeze Bakery
document_data.mainbody: The '''Harbreeze Bakery''' was a beloved eatery of [[Baldur's Gate]], located within the [[the Wide|marketplace]] of the [[Upper City]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. It was run by the red-headed [[Ellyn Harbreeze]], a woman who garnered as much knowledge as some information brokers.
document_data.Services:
The bakery offered such favorite delicacies as [[cinnamon]] cookies and full loaves of [[sugarbread]] highlighted by the flavors of foreign [[tea]]s and [[spices]]. Their real commodity however was in information, specifically that regarding the social lives of the bakery's clientele.

It was one of the favorite mid-day stops for gossipy Baldurian [[patriar]].
